title: Other concepts
content:
*/ ACID

Atomicity : All or nothing
Consistency : Valid State
Isolation : Independence
Durability : Permanence
=> Ensuring database transactions

*/ CAP Theorem

Consistency: All nodes see the same data at the same time
Availability: Every request receives a response
Partition Tolerance: The system continues to operate despite network partitions or communication failures

CP : All node are same data and partition but when some node die => have to wait and sync the data => Not available at that time
AP : All node are available and still can read and write data. Because of partition it write to different node => Need time to sync data at all note => not consistency
CA : All note are same data and available. But some error or network issue => It not work

*/ Authentication & Authorization
* Authentication => Identity user => Verify by password, MFA , v.v...
* Authorization => Verify user permission => Occurs after success Authentication

*/ CRM & ERM
* CRM : Using for front office => Improve customer loyalty, increase sale v.v.. => Ex : sales, marketing campaings, customer services v.v ...
* ERM : Using for back office => Reduce cost, Handle financial data => Ex : HR, inventory, accounting, finance v.v..

*/ 1NF Principle
* 1NF : Make sure all the data of the row is not duplicated
* 2NF : Make sure all the data will be depend on key
* 3NF : Make sure all the data will be depend on nothing but the key
